content: TE-Y-GB (SDS Max) Cruciform drill bit SDS Max (TE-Y) bell-shaped hammer drill bit for drilling into concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Carbide-tipped cruciform head offers fast drilling of penetrations or through holes Up to 20% longer lifetime than other SDS bell-shaped bits Serveral working lengths Fast drilling of penetrations and through-holes Up to 20% longer service life Applications Drilling large penetrations in concrete and masonry Through-hole drilling in concrete and masonry For use in a wide range of heavy power tools, type Y hammer drill bit (SDS Max) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Base material: Concrete, Masonry, Brick, Limestone Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Base material | Concrete, Masonry, Brick, Limestone | Working mode | Hammer drilling ### ITEMS- 220609 - Cruciform bit TE-Y GB 1-1/2 x 23 - Package Size 1 pc - 220611 - Cruciform bit TE-Y GB 1-3/4 x 23 - Package Size 1 pc
